message.body: Yes! Who is this?

Awesome! Can I give you money's/beers/loves/dyes to do this? This is Kennedy. We have a wool (I think? I didn't look at the tag) grayish/brownish jumper and were hoping to make it more navy blueish. I can bring it by/go get whatever you need any evening t
What color do you want it?
Oh
Do you have a washing machine?
The easiest way to dye garments is in the washing machine
Yup!
I don't have one anymore...
I have one at my apt.
Awesome! Well its so straightfoward you prob don't even need my help but there are these little dye packs at artist and craftsmen
You just throw them in the washer with whatever you want dyed
I can help if you need...
Just use cold water so the wool doesn't shrink
The product is called "iDye"
Cool! And it will stay plaid? If that's all I gotta do, I think I can handle it! Thx!
Yeah because plaid is all different colors and values...so each part of the pattern will take the dye in different ways...it will probably look more subtle than
how it currently looks esp if there is white in it
But it should be fine
Rad. Thanks so much! I gives you so much loves!
No problemo! Good luck with it!
Hey kennedy! I wanted to ask a favor...I have an s.p. gig wed and thurs morning until 1130 am and then i have to work at alla spina at 3....if I'm feeling reall
y tired, would it be possible to stay at yr house for a power nap???? I think you live in that area right??? Let me know whatchu think. Thanks!!
Totally! I'll be at work, not sure about Jeremy. If he's not around, we have hidden keys on the block behind our place you can use to get in. I'll talk to him and letcha know!
Awesome thanks!!! Now I don't have to "accidentally" fall asleep at the library.
Never! We have nice comfy couch and Amish space heater for you.
Yayyyy!!
Excellent thanks again!
We had to reschedule the apt viewing for tomorrow at 1:30....you still available to check it out??
Nope :-( let me know how it goes! Also, did john decide if he wants to go look at the prison?
Ill take photos for you. John hasn't mentioned anything bout prison to me...you should text him though
Hey you two! I'm up the street at work havin a soup and wine...join me if you wantsta... :-)
Oh thx! Just got this, was sleepin like a log...I'm guessing yr workin now, but thank you!
I loved your show!!! You are so amazing!!! Xoxo
Thank you lovely! So glad you could make it!
